item.title: The Morning Show Season 4 WEB-DL [Episode 2 Added]
item.dc:creator: BHB
item.description: The latest updates on topics such as fitness, movie reviews, blog updates, horoscopes as well as other events that take place in the country.

item.title: Alien: Earth Season 1 Complete WEB-DL 480p, 720p, & 1080p
item.dc:creator: BHB
item.description: When a mysterious space vessel crash-lands on Earth, Wendy and a ragtag group of tactical soldiers make a fateful discovery that puts them face-to-face with the planet's greatest threat.

item.title: Slow Horses Season 5 WEB-DL [Episode 1 Added]
item.dc:creator: BHB
item.description: A dysfunctional team of MI5 agents and their obnoxious boss, the notorious Jackson Lamb, navigate the espionage world's smoke and mirrors to defend England from sinister forces.

item.title: Space Battleship Yamato (2010) BluRay 480p, 720p & 1080p
item.dc:creator: Saaya
item.description: In 2199, five years after the Gamilas launch attacks on Earth, the planet has been ravaged by the aliens' radiation bombs and the remnants of humanity have moved underground. One day, former pilot Susumu Kodai discovers a message capsule sent from the planet Iskandar that tells of a device that can remove the radiation from the Earth's surface.

item.title: Skin Trade (2014) BluRay 480p, 720p & 1080p
item.dc:creator: Saaya
item.description: Nick, a tough NY cop, runs afoul of the Russian mob engaged in human trafficking, and they end up killing his wife and daughter for revenge. Determined to make them pay, he follows the kingpin to Bangkok, the hub of their activities.

item.title: Sennentuntschi: Curse of the Alps (2010) BluRay 480p, 720p & 1080p
item.dc:creator: Saaya
item.description: Three lonely herdsmen starved of female companionship creates the girl of their dreams, from a broom, some straw and a few rags. The creation - Sennentuntschi, lives and breathe to cook, clean and look after the three.

item.title: Road House (1989) BluRay 480p, 720p & 1080p
item.dc:creator: Saaya
item.description: Serene and laconic but powerful and lethal, expert martial artist Dalton is the best professional bouncer in the business. With his reputation preceding him, Dalton arrives in Jasper, Missouri, to clean up The Double Deuce, a seedy bar terrorised by troublemakers.

item.title: Primary Colors (1998) BluRay 480p, 720p & 1080p
item.dc:creator: Saaya
item.description: Jack Stanton is running for president. The election is seen through the eyes of young Henry Burton. Along the way Stanton must deal with a sex scandal.

item.title: Splitsville (2025) WEB-DL 480p, 720p & 1080p
item.dc:creator: BHB
item.description: When his wife asks for a divorce, a man runs to his friends for support, only to learn that the secret to their happiness is an open marriage.

item.title: Only Murders in the Building Season 5 WEB-DL [Episode 5 Added]
item.dc:creator: BHB
item.description: Three strangers - who live in the same New York City apartment building and share an obsession with true crime - suddenly find themselves embroiled in a murder.

item.title: Marvin’s Room (1996) BluRay 480p, 720p & 1080p
item.dc:creator: Saaya
item.description: Years ago, the fiercely independent Lee took off for Ohio, while her older sister Bessie stayed home to look after their bedridden father, Marvin. Lee has troubles of her own, including her mischievous son Hank, who has a knack for burning down the neighborhood when she's not looking. Seventeen years since her last visit, and after an unexpected call from Bessie, Lee's packs up Hank and his younger brother Charlie for the trip home.

item.title: Don (2006) BluRay 480p, 720p & 1080p
item.dc:creator: Saaya
item.description: In 2006, the drug trade is booming; trafficking between Asian and Europe is at an all time high. It is at this time that the Malaysian intelligence and Anti-Narcotic department are called upon for assistance by their Indian counterparts.

item.title: Devara Part 1 (2024) BluRay 480p, 720p & 1080p
item.dc:creator: Saaya
item.description: A cop trying to trace a gangster reaches a village where the sea is called Laal Samundar he is asked to meet Bahira.But Bhaira attacks him and villagers refuse to corporate until an old man Singappa comes to his aid the cop sees that underneath the sea there are lot many dead bodies which shocks him.

item.title: Den of Thieves (2018) DC UHD BluRay 480p, 720p, 1080p & 2160p
item.dc:creator: Saaya
item.description: A gritty L.A crime saga which follows the intersecting and often personally connected lives of an elite unit of the LA County Sheriff's Dept. and the state's most successful bank robbery crew as the outlaws plan an impossible heist on the Federal Reserve Bank of downtown Los Angeles.

item.title: Body (2015) BluRay 480p, 720p & 1080p
item.dc:creator: Saaya
item.description: Holly, Cali and Mel, three girls celebrating the Christmas holidays at Mel's house the night before Christmas eve. Cali convinces them to go out and have some fun when the others feel like just going to bed (Cali's role as instigator of problems continues throughout the movie).

item.title: The Fantastic Four: First Steps (2025) WEB-DL 480p, 720p & 1080p
item.dc:creator: BHB
item.description: Mister Fantastic, Invisible Woman, Human Torch and the Thing face their most daunting challenge yet as they defend Earth from Galactus and Silver Surfer.
